title: Core Data Element (DAK)
description: Logical Model for representing Core Data Elements from a DAK. A core data element can be one of: a ValueSet, a CodeSystem, a ConceptMap, or a Logical Model adherent to SGLogicalModel.

id.description: Identifier for the core data element

canonical.description: Canonical URI/IRI pointing to the ValueSet, CodeSystem, ConceptMap, or Logical Model definition

uri.description: URI to a Markdown file (absolute or relative to repository root)

description.description: Description of the core data element - either Markdown content or a URI to a Markdown file
